leukapp.apps.extractions.constants module¶

This module contains the extractions app constants. Information that isn’t likely to change and that is used across extractions and leukapp should be stored here.

Important

DO NOT change any constant unless you know what you are doing.

ANALYTE = (('DNA', 'DNA'), ('RNA', 'RNA'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the analyte attribute.

ANALYTE_VALUE = ['DNA', 'RNA']¶

Values for the analyte attribute.

APP_NAME = 'extractions'¶

Application’s name.

CENTER = (('CMO', 'CMO'), ('NYGC', 'NYGC'), ('FOUNDATION', 'FOUNDATION'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the center attribute.

CENTER_VALUE = ['CMO', 'NYGC', 'FOUNDATION']¶

Values for the center attribute.

EXTRACTION_CHOICES = {'PLATFORM': (('AGILENTV4', 'AGILENTV4'), ('AGILENTV5', 'AGILENTV5'), ('WHOLEGENOMELIBRARYV1', 'WHOLEGENOMELIBRARYV1'), ('HEMEPACTV1', 'HEMEPACTV1'), ('HEMEPACTV2', 'HEMEPACTV2')), 'CENTER': (('CMO', 'CMO'), ('NYGC', 'NYGC'), ('FOUNDATION', 'FOUNDATION')), 'TECHNOLOGY': (('WHOLE-EXOME', 'WHOLE-EXOME'), ('WHOLE-GENOME', 'WHOLE-GENOME'), ('TARGETED-DNA', 'TARGETED-DNA'), ('RNA-SEQ-TARGETED', 'RNA-SEQ-TARGETED'), ('RNA-SEQ-WHOLE-TRANSCRIPTOME', 'RNA-SEQ-WHOLE-TRANSCRIPTOME'), ('RNA-SEQ-SINGLE-CELL', 'RNA-SEQ-SINGLE-CELL'), ('DNA-METHYLATION-SEQ', 'DNA-METHYLATION-SEQ'), ('CHIP-SEQ', 'CHIP-SEQ'), ('ATAC-SEQ', 'ATAC-SEQ')), 'ANALYTE': (('DNA', 'DNA'), ('RNA', 'RNA'))}¶

Dictionary including all Extraction's choices.

EXTRACTION_CREATE_FIELDS = ('aliquot', 'platform', 'technology', 'center', 'ext_id', 'analyte', 'projects_string')¶

Fields required to create a new instance.

EXTRACTION_CREATE_PERMISSIONS = ('extractions.add_extraction',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to create a new instance.

EXTRACTION_CREATE_URL = 'extractions:create'¶

Create URL reverse string.

EXTRACTION_LIST_URL = 'extractions:list'¶

List URL reverse string.

EXTRACTION_UNIQUE_TOGETHER = ()¶

Fields that are required to be unique together.

EXTRACTION_UPDATE_FIELDS = ()¶

Enabled fields to update an existing instance.

EXTRACTION_UPDATE_PERMISSIONS = ('extractions.change_extraction',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to update an existing instance.

LEUKID_ANALYTE = {'DNA': 'D', 'RNA': 'R'}¶

Characters used in the leukid to describe the Extraction’s analyte attribute.

PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE = " You don't have permission to perform this action, please contact a\n Leukgen Administrator. "¶

Permission denied message.

PLATFORM = (('AGILENTV4', 'AGILENTV4'), ('AGILENTV5', 'AGILENTV5'), ('WHOLEGENOMELIBRARYV1', 'WHOLEGENOMELIBRARYV1'), ('HEMEPACTV1', 'HEMEPACTV1'), ('HEMEPACTV2', 'HEMEPACTV2'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the platform attribute.

PLATFORM_VALUE = ['AGILENTV4', 'AGILENTV5', 'WHOLEGENOMELIBRARYV1', 'HEMEPACTV1', 'HEMEPACTV2']¶

Values for the platform attribute.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE = 'Looking good'¶

Sucess message.

TECHNOLOGY = (('WHOLE-EXOME', 'WHOLE-EXOME'), ('WHOLE-GENOME', 'WHOLE-GENOME'), ('TARGETED-DNA', 'TARGETED-DNA'), ('RNA-SEQ-TARGETED', 'RNA-SEQ-TARGETED'), ('RNA-SEQ-WHOLE-TRANSCRIPTOME', 'RNA-SEQ-WHOLE-TRANSCRIPTOME'), ('RNA-SEQ-SINGLE-CELL', 'RNA-SEQ-SINGLE-CELL'), ('DNA-METHYLATION-SEQ', 'DNA-METHYLATION-SEQ'), ('CHIP-SEQ', 'CHIP-SEQ'), ('ATAC-SEQ', 'ATAC-SEQ'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the technology attribute.

TECHNOLOGY_VALUE = ['WHOLE-EXOME', 'WHOLE-GENOME', 'TARGETED-DNA', 'RNA-SEQ-TARGETED', 'RNA-SEQ-WHOLE-TRANSCRIPTOME', 'RNA-SEQ-SINGLE-CELL', 'DNA-METHYLATION-SEQ', 'CHIP-SEQ', 'ATAC-SEQ']¶

Values for the technology attribute.
